row.Docu:
Created: 05/07/2018
By: Christine Bauder
Navigation (Including jobname) ADD\PROCESS_FLOWS\APPLICATION_LOADS\FIRE_ENGINE_RED_UCCS_NSE/ADS_NSE_PROC_NO_FILE_EMAIL
Description: Email Notification to notify that there is no NSE file
Developer:
Script used:/prod/scripts/mailattach.pl
Calendar:
Triggered by: Triggering message:
Rerun Instructions: FIX ERROR AND RERUN
Call job: __ YES _X_ NO All jobs are call jobs unless otherwise noted.
Criticality: needs to run, if you cant fix it put it in turnover for the a.m. shift to work on.
Fixer: PS.CC
Abend History: Include date, time, and initials of modifier
Change History;

row.process: /prod/scripts/mailattach.pl \ --from \ ps.cc@cu.edu \ --to \ jeff.gloyd@cu.edu \ !phillip.curry@cu.edu,Christie.ruemenapp@cu.edu \ --cc \ ps.cc@cu.edu \ --subject \ "There was no CUBLD_SLATE_MATR.txt file at ft.technolutions.net" \ --message \ "The job CUBLD_SLATE_MATR got a rc=1 due to no file the provess flow has been cancelled out." \
